post.body: LOL at the random thought- haven't put it on yet! LOLOL
I just started it recently tho...you can have lots & lots of pages
there r a few ways 2 make money from it-u can showcase ebay items, cafepress, zazzle..some other things & u make money from ads 2
luv ur trust in Higher Power affirmation. Thanks!
i'd never heard of it before. Have you tried Squidoo too?
congrats on the new house!
awesome mission! :-)
thanks for that article recomendation. Did you write it?
lol at your note to self
celebrate :-)
aww cute pic! My puppy was kinda scared of it hehe.
sorry to hear about your dog. Will send energy to help.
yes, I have found being positive changes what I get, too.
do u mean can u add ur own graphics at squidoo? yep
Ok, so I now realize I spelled Chilaquiles wrong ;-p
Tried to give up my weekly chilakilles at Papas N Beer & go somewhere else yesterday. Didn't work. Craving 2 strong. Going there 2day ;-)
This was motivational: http://tinyurl.com/6efllz
Affirmation: "Today I will send love and appreciation to my body."
Affirmation: "Today I choose to laugh, instead."
Feeling a lil' better. Working on making funny t-shirts today and reading more Eragon. Don't plan on leaving the house.
Affirmation: "Today I will move forward with a project."
hibernating w/ a cold. Reading Eragon.
Affirmation: "Shining my light helps others to shine theirs."
very productive day @ the restaurant! 2morro more productivity then lunch w/ friend to go over The 4 Agreements & a new client in the eve!
Just read in 4 Agreements abt life being a dream...just made this tee a cpl mos ago http://www.cafepress.com/lifeisadream.324713033
Ho'oponopono healing circle tonight- 8 pm EST at http://www.earthbornerising.com. For more info see http://www.mystijul.com
Affirmation: "Today I choose peace instead."
Paperwork & menu planning @ the store 1st, then probably cleaning here and reading.
Affirmation: "I allow the healing to occur."
Hubby: "Going psychotic on someone isn't a legitimate boxing move!" Me "But it works!!!" 5 wins. He won't play Wii w/ me much longer hehe
Newest t-shirt design- inspired by hubby lolol. My fave's the doggy tee! http://tinyurl.com/69857s
